reviewText: Very well documented, and timely.  Gen 3:5 seemed to ring bells as I watched this film, where Satan tells Eve "...ye shall be like gods..." Same trick since the Garden of Eden!  If you want to share the end game with a small group, suggest this one!
Pretty informative, though I felt a little more could be done.
Great video on a timely subject.  Gives both sides of the story, and leaves viewers with a clear understanding of what is trying to be done and what is at stake.

Very informative and well produced DVD.  I liked that both sides were presented, I would have liked that a professional (doctorate level, someone in the field or expert) on the transhumanist side would have been interviewed in addition to or instead of the woman that was interviewed as she definitely, although a believer wasn't technically adept or knowledgeable on the subject matter.  However, the other subject matter experts (SMEs) were very knowledgeable, Especially Dr. Thomas Horn who has been following this subject for many years now, and Dr. Chuck Missler, who has since passed on.  I look forward to the next DVD in the series, if one is ever made?
If you object to "singularity" or trans humanism on religious grounds, you'll probably enjoy this video.  If you want a more scientific, objective analysis of this issue, you'll be disappointed.

Almost in every movie humans have some kind of computer in their brains or body parts. Some have animal like features. Transhumanism dvd verified what I've been thinking for a long time. God help us all.

Poor sound quality.
Watch on YouTube instead.
Truly informative and a great read for understanding today's culture and its clashes!

Fear propaganda from church-goers who are so desperate to maintain control that they will literally try to convince the faithful that they are destined for gas chambers if they accept humanity's technological advancements.
Not scripture supporting nor biblical, more speculative an scientific, good for worldview knowledge, not biblical
The world needs to open it's eyes to the reality of transhumanism....soon!!!
wow!!! we are in deep trouble !!
